summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Company Profile page and Receipt PDF integration. Backend: 15/15 tests passed. Frontend: All features working - Company Profile page loads at /settings/company-profile with all required fields, save functionality works, and Receipt PDF correctly uses Company Profile data.

issues: Minor: Missing aria-describedby for DialogContent (accessibility warning in console)

passed_tests: Company Profile has all required sections: Company Identity, Address, Contact Information, Branding, Document Settings

Company Profile form has all required fields: legal_name, brand_name, tagline, gstin, pan, address_line1, address_line2, city, state, pincode, country, primary_email, secondary_email, phone, website, primary_color, secondary_color, authorized_signatory, receipt_footer_note
Logo upload and favicon upload inputs exist
Color pickers (primary_color, secondary_color) visible and functional
Company Profile save works and shows success toast
Company Profile data persists correctly after save
Partial updates work correctly (only specified fields updated)
Receipt PDF generates with valid %PDF header
Receipt PDF uses accounting-grade design (neutral colors - charcoal/grey, no blue)
Receipt PDF shows company data from Company Profile: brand_name, tagline, full address, email, phone, website, gstin
Receipt PDF footer shows receipt_footer_note from Company Profile settings
Receipt PDF has authorized_signatory from Company Profile settings
Receipt PDF shows: Receipt Number, Date, Customer Name, Project ID, Payment Description, Amount, Mode, Account, Contract Value, Total Received, Balance Due, Notes
PDF download works from Receipts page with success toast
updated_files: /app/tests/test_company_profile.py - Created comprehensive test file for Company Profile and PDF integration
seed_data_creation: Used existing test data. Company Profile updated with test values during testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Company Profile page fully tested at /settings/company-profile. All fields work: legal_name, brand_name, tagline, gstin, pan, address fields, contact fields, branding (logo upload, color pickers), document settings (authorized_signatory, receipt_footer_note). Receipt PDF correctly pulls all company data and displays in accounting-grade format with neutral colors (charcoal/grey). PDF includes: company name, tagline, full address, contact info, GSTIN, authorized signatory, and custom footer note.
